transcript.speaker: Sam Chen
transcript.text: Alright, let's do a quick round. Priya, you want to start?

transcript.speaker: Priya Sharma
transcript.text: Sure. I'm still working on the Metrics Dashboard redesign. Hit a snag with the real-time charts—need to talk to Marcus about the websocket connection.

transcript.speaker: Marcus Williams
transcript.text: Yeah, happy to sync on that. On my end, the Checkout Service refactor is going well. Got the new payment flow working locally. Should have a PR up by end of day.

transcript.speaker: Riley O'Brien
transcript.text: Quick heads up—the CI pipeline is running slow again. I've been investigating the CI Pipeline Slowdown issue. Looks like it's the test parallelization config. Should have a fix today.

transcript.speaker: Sam Chen
transcript.text: Good. The Platform Migration is still on track for the Q2 launch. Marcus, make sure the Checkout Service changes are compatible with the new architecture.

transcript.speaker: Marcus Williams
transcript.text: Will do. I'll coordinate with Riley on the deployment strategy.

transcript.speaker: Sam Chen
transcript.text: Perfect. Anything blocking anyone? No? Alright, let's get to it.
